name: Ravenous (berumondo)
description:
You're being chased by a horrible monster eating everything in its wake, and your only option is to run away. It would be way easier if it wasn't for all this stuff lying around!

Try to avoid the obstacles and the leeches in your way. Leeches slow you down, but you can get rid of them by typing the letters that show up.

Controls : 
- space to jump
- F3 / F4 to change window scaling
- alt-Enter to switch to fullscreen

Credits : 
- Brother_main : code and sound
- Berumondo : code and placeholder graphics
- Special thanks to Tori for the quick additional artwork (aka the sprites that actually look good)
